news.title: News
news.author: Author
news.imageUploadInfo: Images will be automatically resized to max {{maxImageSize}}px and converted to PNG format. Signed URLs are generated via GraphQL for secure direct upload to Google Cloud Storage.
news.uploadingToGCS: Uploading to Google Cloud Storage via GraphQL signed URLs...

item.createItemError: Failed to create item. Please try again.
item.fileTooLarge: File {{fileName}} is too large. Maximum size is 50MB
item.confirmRequestMessage: Are you sure you want to request this item? This will create a transaction between you and the owner.
item.requestSuccess: Request submitted successfully! The owner will be notified.
item.transactionLocationNote: This is where you'll meet to complete the transaction.
item.ownerWillBeNotified: The owner will be notified of your request.
item.ownerAndHolderWillBeNotified: Both the owner and current holder will be notified of your request, as they are different people.
item.noExistingRequests: No existing open requests for this item. You'll be the first!
item.existingRequestsWarning: There {count, plural, one {is # existing open request} other {are # existing open requests}} for this item. Your request will be added to the queue.
item.availableMessage: This item is available for borrowing!
item.availableDescription: You can contact the owner to borrow this item.
item.exchangeableMessage: This item is available for exchange!
item.exchangeableDescription: You can offer another item in exchange for this one.
item.giftMessage: This item is available as a gift!
item.giftDescription: The owner is giving away this item for free.
item.transferInstructions: Please meet with the requestor in person to complete the transfer. Click 'Complete Transfer' once you have handed over the item.
item.itemTransferred: The item has been transferred and is ready for you to receive.
item.receiveInstructions: After clicking 'Received', you will become the new holder of this item. The item location will be updated to your address, and you will be responsible for:
item.responsibility1: Responding to future requests from other users
item.responsibility2: Handing over the item to the next requestor when needed
item.responsibility3: Returning the item to the original owner if requested
item.confirmReceiptInstructions: Please only click 'Received' after you have physically received the item from the current holder.

userProfile.exchangePointsHelper: Select exchange points where you can meet for item handovers
userProfile.locationNotFound: Could not find location for the address.

user.tagCloudHelper: Click on a category to filter items. Larger tags indicate more items in that category.
user.noItemsInCategoryYou: You haven't added any {{category}} items yet.
user.noItemsInCategoryUser: This user hasn't added any {{category}} items yet.
user.exchangePointItemsHelper: When enabled, includes items cached at your exchange point in addition to your personal items.
user.selectCategoryToViewItems: Select a category below to view items.
